name: AVCaptureDevice.DeviceType
desc: Values identifying the capture deviceâ€™s type.

items.name: static let builtInDualCamera: AVCaptureDevice.DeviceType
items.desc: A combination of wide-angle and telephoto cameras that creates a capture device.

items.name: static let builtInDualWideCamera: AVCaptureDevice.DeviceType
items.desc: A device that consists of two cameras of fixed focal length, one ultrawide angle and one wide angle.

items.name: static let builtInTripleCamera: AVCaptureDevice.DeviceType
items.desc: A device that consists of three cameras of fixed focal length, one ultrawide angle, one wide angle, and one telephoto.

items.name: static let builtInUltraWideCamera: AVCaptureDevice.DeviceType
items.desc: A built-in camera with a shorter focal length than that of a wide-angle camera.

items.name: static let builtInTelephotoCamera: AVCaptureDevice.DeviceType
items.desc: A built-in camera device with a longer focal length than a wide-angle camera.

items.name: static let builtInLiDARDepthCamera: AVCaptureDevice.DeviceType
items.desc: A device that consists of two cameras, one LiDAR and one YUV.

items.name: static let builtInTrueDepthCamera: AVCaptureDevice.DeviceType
items.desc: A combination of cameras and other sensors that creates a capture device capable of photo, video, and depth capture.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates an AVCaptureDevice.DeviceType value from its string representation.
